HeroPage.title: Take ideas from better to best
HeroPage.paragraph: Miro is your team's visual platform to connect, collaborate, and create — together.
HeroPage.subParagraph: Collaborate with your team within minutes

Body1.title: Collaborate without constraints
Body1.paragraph1: Our free plan gives you unlimited team members, 3 boards, and 300+ expert-made templates. Signing up with your work email lets you bring in your team faster. See our pricing plans for more features.
Body1.paragraph2: Miro has 100+ powerful integrations with tools you already use like G Suite, Slack, and Jira, so your workflow is seamless. View the full list in our Marketplace .
Body1.paragraph3: We treat your data like you would — with the utmost care. We follow industry-leading security standards and give you tools to protect intellectual property. Learn more at our Trust Center .

Body2.title: Work together, wherever you work
Body2.paragraph: In the office, remote, or a mix of the two, with Miro, your team can connect, collaborate, and co-create in one space no matter where you are.

Body3.title: Connect your tools,  close your tabs
Body3.paragraph: Whether you want to edit your Google Docs, resolve Jira issues, or collaborate over Zoom, Miro has 100+ integrations with tools you already use and love
